details: The chances of obtaining loot from Crocodyl Chiefs are increased by 150%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Amakna Forest area.
Alchemists have a 10% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items.
The quality of items crafted in Amakna Village and Forest is increased.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in Tanukouï San's Workshop.
The quantity of Kittenfish, Ediem Carp, Pike andEel harvested by Fishermen is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Tears of Ouronigride area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained by fighting Gobkools and Cave Gobballs is increased by 200%.
Experience gains are increased by 50% for all harvesting professions.
All varieties of Plum Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The quantity of Bauxite harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Icefields area.
Experience gained in the Tears of Ouronigride area is increased by 100%.
Experience gained from Kolossium fights is increased by 100%.
The quantity of Marbled Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Vulkania monsters are increased by 75%.
Experience gains and the chances of obtaining loot are increased by 25% in the Astrub Meadow zone.
Craftsmen have a 15% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items in the Gobball Corner area.
Experience gained in the Grotto Hesque is increased by 125%.
Cereals harvested by farmers will reappear 100% more quickly than usual.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Zoth Village area are increased by 100%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Frigost Village monsters.
Pet and petsmount bonuses are increased by 100%.
The quantity of Aspen, Holy Bamboo and Elm wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 200%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against creatures in the Pig family.
Experience gained in the Lonesome Pine Trails area is increased by 100%.
Hunters have a 10% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Snowy Forest and Sakai Plain areas.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Tanukouï San's Workshop dungeon are increased by 125%.

bonus: Loot and XP in the Haunted House
details: Experience gains and the chances of dropping loot are increased by 125% in the Haunted House dungeon.
Experience gained by fighting Vulkania monsters is increased by 75%.
